item.description:
"It is not what happens in our lives that defines our health but how we react to it. It is our spiritual beliefs, our beliefs of who we are, how we fit in this world, and where and if we belong, that most impact our personality, and whether we come from a healthy place of belonging and confidence or a wounded, defended place of anger, sadness, or fear.

 The key is to become aware of your reactionary personality style and then recognize that your personality is not you."  

Find the key to awareness with Dr. Dorothy Martin-Neville, an international speaker, teacher, author, psychotherapist, medical intuitive, and healer.

We are so fortunate to have Dr. Dorothy as our guest speaker in April.  Her loving down to earth style is sure to delight you as she presents mind blowing ideas about the mind body connection and how personality affects health.  Don't miss it!!
item.name: Learn How Personality affects Health with Dr. Dorothy Martin-Neville
